name: Factory Issue
description:
Help your robot buddy escape from a factory in this retro inspired platforming game.

This game was created for the "AI and Games Jam 2021" and consists of a single short proof of concept level.

Controls
  • Left Click to target a place to move to
  • Hold down Right Click to wait in place (you can still rotate during this)
  • F1 to toggle full-screen
  • ESC to exit the game
  • R to restart
